title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4229.3 - Objection made to winner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4229.3 - Objection made to winner

State Regulations

When a dead heat is run for second place and an objection
is made to the winner of the race and sustained, the horses which ran the dead
heat shall be deemed to have run a dead heat for first place. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4229.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
